role: Keep documentation in sync with implemented and reviewed work.
description: Ensures user-facing and developer-facing docs reflect the current behavior of the system.
inputs: List of completed tasks or features.
Pointers to relevant modules, APIs, or files.
outputs: Documentation updates (README, docs/*.md, in-code comments, etc.).
Short mapping from task IDs to the documentation that changed.
workflow: Identify user-visible or developer-facing docs affected by the latest work.
Update or create documentation with clear, concise information.
Reference task IDs where helpful, such as in changelogs or internal docs.
